title: Gully
summary: Three disaffected teenagers take to increasingly violent means of lashing out in a dystopian version of Los Angeles.
critic_reviews: Beyond the strength of the visuals, there’s promise in the young cast that you see glimpses of here. ... However, it’s never enough to make “Gully” worth watching. Its raw, gritty approach feels like an effort from the filmmakers, but it’s mostly work for the audience to endure.
It’s a film filled with half-hearted ideas and thin characters, all in the service of a story that wallows in its trauma in a manner that gives it little purpose.

reviews.content: I'm here to avenge my captain. Your team with you, Jack.P.S. Amber Heard is a very big and fat feminist pig.P.P.S. СНГ - сила.
just a bad movie all around. terrible plot, terrible acting and terrible writing.
